ajxpdriver.name: ftp
ajxpdriver.label: CONF_MESSAGE[FTP Server]
ajxpdriver.description: CONF_MESSAGE[This driver can access a remote FTP server]

param.name: PATH
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Path]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Real path to the root folder on the server]

param.name: FTP_SECURE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Secure]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Whether to use ftp or ftps protocol]

param.name: FTP_DIRECT
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Active]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Whether to use active or passive]

param.name: CREATE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Create]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Create folder if it does not exists]

param.name: FIX_PERMISSIONS
param.choices: detect_remote_user_id|Detect remote server user,user|Copy user perms to all,group|Copy group perms to all
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Fix Permissions]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[How to handle remote permissions to be used by PHP as local permissions. See manual.]

param.name: TMP_UPLOAD
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Temporary Folder]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Temporary folder on the local server used for file uploads. For the moment, it must be placed under your ajaxplorer folder and you must create it and set it writeable by Apache.]

param.name: DYNAMIC_FTP
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Pass Ftp data through Auth driver]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[In conjunction with a correctly configured auth.ftp driver, this allow to transform ajaxplorer into a simple netFtp client.]

global_param.name: DEFAULT_METASOURCES
global_param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Metasources]
global_param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Comma separated list of metastore and meta plugins, that will be automatically applied to all repositories created with this driver]
